history.proof: intros l R R' S H1 H2. intros x y H3. unfold evolve_1 in *. intros H4. qsimpl use: union2_evolve. qsimpl use: union2_evolve. qsimpl use: union2_evolve. sfirstorder depth: 3.

ctx: intros l R R' S H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type X, Y : Type TX : reduction_t A X TY : reduction_t A Y F : function X Y B : relation X l : Lbl A R, R', S : relation2 X Y H1 : incl R R' H2 : diagram (TX l) R' (Weak TY l) S x, y : X H3 : Y H4 : TX l x y Unable to unify "forall (x x' : X) (y : Y), TX ?M1509 x x' -> ?M1511 x y -> exists2 y' : Y, Weak TY ?M1509 y y' & ?M1512 x' y'" with "R x H3".

ctx: intros l R R' S H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type X, Y : Type TX : reduction_t A X TY : reduction_t A Y H : forall (l : Lbl A) (R R' S : relation2 X Y), evolve_1 l R S -> evolve_1 l R' S -> evolve_1 l (union2 R R') S F : function X Y B : relation X l : Lbl A R, R', S : relation2 X Y H1 : incl R R' H2 : diagram (TX l) R' (Weak TY l) S x, y : X H3 : Y H4 : TX l x y H0 : R x H3 Unable to unify "incl R R'" with "exists2 y' : Y, Weak TY l H3 y' & S y y'".

ctx: intros l R R' S H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type X, Y : Type TX : reduction_t A X TY : reduction_t A Y H5 : forall (l : Lbl A) (R R' S : relation2 X Y), evolve_1 l R S -> evolve_1 l R' S -> evolve_1 l (union2 R R') S F : function X Y B : relation X l : Lbl A R, R', S : relation2 X Y H1 : incl R R' H2 : diagram (TX l) R' (Weak TY l) S x, y : X H3 : Y H4 : TX l x y H0 : R x H3 Unable to unify "TX l x y" with "exists2 y' : Y, Weak TY l H3 y' & S y y'".

original: intros l R R' S H1 H2. intros x y H3. unfold evolve_1 in *. intros H4. apply union2_evolve. - apply H1. - apply H4.
